word: G5230 - ὑπέρακμος - hypérakmos - hoop-er'-ak-mos - + pass the flower of age

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: + pass the flower of age
1. beyond the akmee or bloom of life, past prime
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G5228 and the base of G188; beyond the “acme”, that is, figuratively (of a daughter) past the bloom (prime) of youth: - + pass the flower of (her) age.
